prompt: I hope these queries are helpful for your testing purposes.
icl_complete: Thank you! If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. I'm here to help with a wide range of topics, from answering questions to providing detailed explanations. Let me know how I can assist you today!
judgement: The completion is satisfactory but not fully aligned with the provided feedback.
advise: Ensure you carefully review any specific instructions given in the feedback. In this case, although the feedback was about not mentioning elephants, it is good practice to subtly assure the requester that their feedback is being taken into consideration in your response. This builds trust and ensures the requester knows you are attentive to their needs.
